alert.note: Alert for Furnas; Gosper (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 6:58PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Gosper and northwestern Furnas Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 658 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holbrook, or 30 miles southeast of Curtis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Gosper and northwestern Furnas Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for south central Nebraska.
